item.title: Shop not working?
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

Why aren’t any of my shops working anymore? They all worked 2 days ago now they won’t. Here is what some look like…

else if (NPCID == 1552) { // lal santas holiday stuff PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 31; } else if (NPCID == 2262) { // dark mage rbe shp PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 32; } else if (NPCID == 2253) { // Wise old man PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 38; }

By the way it IS all under case 155: // first npc click. And its not only that the shops aren’t working, its none of the npcs that used to talk to you when u clicked on them work anymore. And all the shops open up when u press shop emote so it’s not the shops. The error must be somewhere in case 155 but no compile errors. Please help.

Read full topic
